FK.content: machine-like & faith as one and the same possibility, machine-like & sacrosanctity (heilig, holy, safe, unscathed, free, “swollen”) of the phallic effect: phallus as phainesthai, phenomenon (day of phallus) & also phantasm, fetish, specter, its double: colossal automaticity [phallic in bold 2x]
FK.linkedContent: machine-like & faith as one and the same possibility, machine-like & sacrosanctity (heilig, holy, safe, unscathed, free, “swollen”) of the phallic effect: phallus as phainesthai, phenomenon (day of phallus) & also phantasm, fetish, specter, its double: colossal automaticity [phallic in bold 2x]

FK.content: phallus, the marionette, virtuality of virtuality, distinct from penis: parade fetish, the healthy, the automatic sur-viving, faith in most living as dead
FK.linkedContent: phallus, the marionette, virtuality of virtuality, distinct from penis: parade fetish, the healthy, the automatic sur-viving, faith in most living as dead

FK.content: matrix of unlimited, general fetishization of Thing itself > read the unscathed as spontaneity of erection or pregnancy [phallus must swell in vitality]
FK.linkedContent: matrix of unlimited, general fetishization of Thing itself > read the unscathed as spontaneity of erection or pregnancy [phallus must swell in vitality]

FK.content: [via Benveniste, via etymology, Derrida links power, vitality to swelling, to womb]

FK.content: machine, mechanics, reproduces the dead in the living; the marionette, the dead machine, automation acc. phallic effect
FK.linkedContent: machine, mechanics, reproduces the dead in the living; the marionette, the dead machine, automation acc. phallic effect

FK.content: in view of invisible, spectral sur-vival, an excess beyond living, life worth more than life, space of death opens—linked to automaton (exemplarily “phallic”), to technics, machine, prosthesis
FK.linkedContent: in view of invisible, spectral sur-vival, an excess beyond living, life worth more than life, space of death opens—linked to automaton (exemplarily “phallic”), to technics, machine, prosthesis

OH.content: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end
OH.linkedContent: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end

OH.content: word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”
OH.linkedContent: word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”

WM.content: Freud on phallic nature of the dress tie, mocks the custom
WM.linkedContent: Freud on phallic nature of the dress tie, mocks the custom

DS.content: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron, tailpiece
DS.linkedContent: what ruins the “pious capital letter,” the aplomb of the heading: the blanks, ordered return of white spaces, measure & order of dissemination, law of spacing, rhythmos, invisible fleuron, tailpiece

DS.content: Mallarmé’s i: a slash that never cuts its wing, penna (feather pen), needles and scratches; hymen fastens down, crinkles and folds this i [m/f]
DS.linkedContent: Mallarmé’s i: a slash that never cuts its wing, penna (feather pen), needles and scratches; hymen fastens down, crinkles and folds this i [m/f]

DS.content: infinite unfolding of aviary, of fan > ailes, elle, l, il—li (lit)
DS.linkedContent: infinite unfolding of aviary, of fan > ailes, elle, l, il—li (lit)

DS.content: [Derrida comes back to i] reads little point as a decapitation right next to castrated pike > capital I (disseminates unity of meaning), ego, ice, écho—plus-je > (I + Dé)irisation
DS.linkedContent: [Derrida comes back to i] reads little point as a decapitation right next to castrated pike > capital I (disseminates unity of meaning), ego, ice, écho—plus-je > (I + Dé)irisation

P.content: if we’re in a hurry, we’ll conclude the colossal is the phallus, which doubles the corpse; Derrida jokes: don’t hurry when it’s a matter of erection, let the thing happen

POS.content: paraphrasing Freud, speaking of present/absent penis (the same thing), we must recognize truth as “normal prototype of the fetish”
POS.linkedContent: paraphrasing Freud, speaking of present/absent penis (the same thing), we must recognize truth as “normal prototype of the fetish”

POS.content: dissemination puts at stake (play) castration’s position as transcendental signifier/signified (phallus, transcendental signifier, as correlate to primary signified, mother’s desire)
POS.linkedContent: dissemination puts at stake (play) castration’s position as transcendental signifier/signified (phallus, transcendental signifier, as correlate to primary signified, mother’s desire)

ROP.content: in EN, in interminable conversation w/ Lacan, Derrida thinks contingency, singularity, event, tukhē, which is also a thinking of death, whose signifier would be the phallus
ROP.linkedContent: in EN, in interminable conversation w/ Lacan, Derrida thinks contingency, singularity, event, tukhē, which is also a thinking of death, whose signifier would be the phallus

SP.content: umbrella’s symbolic figure: hermaphroditic spur of a phallus (modestly folded dans ses voiles) > aggressive/apotropaic à la fois threatening/threatened
SP.linkedContent: umbrella’s symbolic figure: hermaphroditic spur of a phallus (modestly folded dans ses voiles) > aggressive/apotropaic à la fois threatening/threatened

ATIA.content: is all “hiding of oneself” modesty? is there modesty not directed toward genitalia? the metonymy has been arrested/concentrated on phallic region
ATIA.linkedContent: is all “hiding of oneself” modesty? is there modesty not directed toward genitalia? the metonymy has been arrested/concentrated on phallic region

O.content: [Derrida links stone to the phallus and then to Freud’s Das Medusenhaupt, what if the phallus has no center?]
O.linkedContent: [Derrida links stone to the phallus and then to Freud’s Das Medusenhaupt, what if the phallus has no center?]

O.content: [in field of dissemination] formalism no longer fails (n’échoue) before empirical richness [like in Hegel?] but before une queue, dont le se-mordre [self-bite] n’est ni spéculaire ni symbolique
O.linkedContent: [in field of dissemination] formalism no longer fails (n’échoue) before empirical richness [like in Hegel?] but before une queue, dont le se-mordre [self-bite] n’est ni spéculaire ni symbolique

SW.content: if tekhnē never broke radically w/ physis—why reserve this animal naturality to woman? > woman weaves like a body secreting its own textile, like a worm, a worm w/out worm, a worm concerned to hide her non-being
SW.linkedContent: if tekhnē never broke radically w/ physis—why reserve this animal naturality to woman? > woman weaves like a body secreting its own textile, like a worm, a worm w/out worm, a worm concerned to hide her non-being

SW.content: what if the fantasy (the arm) and truth (the unveiled) are on same side, same rib (du côté de la même côte) (man woman) [deconstruction of sexual difference] > extricate before opposing absence to presence [Freud’s penis envy]: of the Thing (Phallus, Penis, Cause) behind Veil
SW.linkedContent: what if the fantasy (the arm) and truth (the unveiled) are on same side, same rib (du côté de la même côte) (man woman) [deconstruction of sexual difference] > extricate before opposing absence to presence [Freud’s penis envy]: of the Thing (Phallus, Penis, Cause) behind Veil

SW.content: culpable edging of phallus, edges of the cut, support the veil, hold it like a roof, canvas—this theoretical toilet of the phallus is the concept > phallus is the concept: can’t oppose it, nor a “sexual theory”: unless you do something different, the way you set the sail (Benjamin)
SW.linkedContent: culpable edging of phallus, edges of the cut, support the veil, hold it like a roof, canvas—this theoretical toilet of the phallus is the concept > phallus is the concept: can’t oppose it, nor a “sexual theory”: unless you do something different, the way you set the sail (Benjamin)

REST.content: for Freud, the shoe always a “form” of prosthesis, but always as a penis (woman’s penis too)? but Ferenczi recognizes in it the vagina
REST.linkedContent: for Freud, the shoe always a “form” of prosthesis, but always as a penis (woman’s penis too)? but Ferenczi recognizes in it the vagina

REST.content: for Freud, certain symbols cannot be masculine & feminine at same time, but bisexual symbolization remains archaic, irrepressible tendency going back to child ignorant of sexual difference
REST.linkedContent: for Freud, certain symbols cannot be masculine & feminine at same time, but bisexual symbolization remains archaic, irrepressible tendency going back to child ignorant of sexual difference

WAP.content: as a didactic technique, teaching becomes organon of repetition, teaching as history of the sign > teaching body lives from belief in transcendental signified, which comes back to life, more and better, w/ authority of transcendental phallus (signifier of signifiers)
WAP.linkedContent: as a didactic technique, teaching becomes organon of repetition, teaching as history of the sign > teaching body lives from belief in transcendental signified, which comes back to life, more and better, w/ authority of transcendental phallus (signifier of signifiers)

D.content: knife, obsessive, phallus that threatens & is threatened, la menace du coupe-papier dont saigna la tranche rouge ouvre ou érige (which the red edge bled opens or erects), thus broaching/breaching (entamant) in a stroke (d’un trait) the decision: opens mouth > operation of reading/writing
D.linkedContent: knife, obsessive, phallus that threatens & is threatened, la menace du coupe-papier dont saigna la tranche rouge ouvre ou érige (which the red edge bled opens or erects), thus broaching/breaching (entamant) in a stroke (d’un trait) the decision: opens mouth > operation of reading/writing

D.content: text occupies place before “me,” announces me to myself—une tour de guet (watchtower) planted inside me > like a “transparent column,” pure outside: driven into that which tries to close in on itself > imagine you swallowed a cylindrical mirror, tower of Babel, bottomless plurality, not negative…also phallic [p. 342 in Zohar: “great, ungraspable columns of air”]
D.linkedContent: text occupies place before “me,” announces me to myself—une tour de guet (watchtower) planted inside me > like a “transparent column,” pure outside: driven into that which tries to close in on itself > imagine you swallowed a cylindrical mirror, tower of Babel, bottomless plurality, not negative…also phallic [p. 342 in Zohar: “great, ungraspable columns of air”]

D.content: column is nothing, no meaning in itself, a hollow phallus > guarantees innumerable passage of dissemination and playful displacement of margins
D.linkedContent: column is nothing, no meaning in itself, a hollow phallus > guarantees innumerable passage of dissemination and playful displacement of margins

D.content: column is not, passage of dissemination, “phallic” significance of column is a semic effect, reflection on 4th surface (described center, represented mastery of dissemination); “is”—procures calm, consciousness of ideal mastery > operation of 4th surface
D.linkedContent: column is not, passage of dissemination, “phallic” significance of column is a semic effect, reflection on 4th surface (described center, represented mastery of dissemination); “is”—procures calm, consciousness of ideal mastery > operation of 4th surface

D.content: column has no being, belongs to no one
D.linkedContent: column has no being, belongs to no one

+R.content: bait (amorce) for Christic phallus (Ichthys): track, graph or trace (Ichnos) of a voiceless bit (mors), Derrida translates title of Adami’s picture [on Glas] as Ich [I’m exhibiting Ich—as an other]

+R.content: each letter [re: Adami’s drawing] has the same arched, slightly in-curved rigidity, supple flexion of an erect phallus—fish btwn life/death
+R.linkedContent: each letter [re: Adami’s drawing] has the same arched, slightly in-curved rigidity, supple flexion of an erect phallus—fish btwn life/death

+R.content: fishing picture, record of a hunt: 2 death drives cross in an X (double diagonal): 1) pushes, attracts, holds down—descending column 2) the other, just as sublime, raises up, asphyxia of the phallus—ascending column
+R.linkedContent: fishing picture, record of a hunt: 2 death drives cross in an X (double diagonal): 1) pushes, attracts, holds down—descending column 2) the other, just as sublime, raises up, asphyxia of the phallus—ascending column

+R.content: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic
+R.linkedContent: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic

BSi.content: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought
BSi.linkedContent: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought

BSi.content: the World Trade Center as image of Valéry’s double capitalized phallic erection (jealous of themselves) > double turn makes one think of double tower (tour)
BSi.linkedContent: the World Trade Center as image of Valéry’s double capitalized phallic erection (jealous of themselves) > double turn makes one think of double tower (tour)

BSi.content: “excellently eminent and excellently phallic erection of sovereign highness”
BSi.linkedContent: “excellently eminent and excellently phallic erection of sovereign highness”

BSi.content: sexual difference, 2 marionettes—those afraid of “it’s not so simple,” afraid of sexual difference, of equivocality of living being: of the subtle difference, or blurred difference, btwn sponte sua, autonomy, and reactive automaticity
BSi.linkedContent: sexual difference, 2 marionettes—those afraid of “it’s not so simple,” afraid of sexual difference, of equivocality of living being: of the subtle difference, or blurred difference, btwn sponte sua, autonomy, and reactive automaticity

BSi.content: phallic figure haunted by virgin girl
quasi-mechanical, automatic reaction of phallic erection
phallus as marionette avant la lettre: simulacrum, prosthetic, automatic machine—is the phallus human at all? > phallic erection is a machine but also the attribute of sovereignty
BSi.linkedContent: phallus as marionette avant la lettre: simulacrum, prosthetic, automatic machine—is the phallus human at all? > phallic erection is a machine but also the attribute of sovereignty

BSi.content: [in some cultures] women break their hymen on wooden phallus (simulacrum of phallus)
BSi.linkedContent: [in some cultures] women break their hymen on wooden phallus (simulacrum of phallus)

BSi.content: ithyphallic: hardness, straight, rigid, standing phallus

for Derrida, hypothesis that bêtise always threatens imperturbable ithyphallus is the essential ithyphallic bêtise > ithyphallus’ hyperbolical desire is nil/empty of thought, this void pushes, pulses, compulses, makes one think of a drive that is absolutely bête, never gives up anything, absolute stranger to all thought

BSi.content: priapism is infinite ithyphallism, foreign to finitude of erection (finitude makes erection possible) > thus, is detumescence castration?
BSi.linkedContent: priapism is infinite ithyphallism, foreign to finitude of erection (finitude makes erection possible) > thus, is detumescence castration?

BSi.content: if phallus is proper to sovereign, is it proper to man?
BSi.linkedContent: if phallus is proper to sovereign, is it proper to man?

ATAP.content: from Kant to Freud, no sexual difference (pas de différence) in castration or emasculation (Entmannung) [either one has male genital or one is castrated], only the masculine!
ATAP.linkedContent: from Kant to Freud, no sexual difference (pas de différence) in castration or emasculation (Entmannung) [either one has male genital or one is castrated], only the masculine!

ATAP.content: castration [of reason], a metaphor/simulacrum, concerns phallus (not penis/clitoris); Bemächtigungstrieb
ATAP.linkedContent: castration [of reason], a metaphor/simulacrum, concerns phallus (not penis/clitoris); Bemächtigungstrieb

SPEC.content: [Ernst’s fort/da] collective unity [of toys] is apparatus of game that can dislocate itself > word for things in this theory of set is Zeug, which is also penis: supplementary complex that can reassemble parents

FV.content: for Freud, dreams of nakedness don’t exhibit penis or absence of penis but absence of phallus, absence of attribute supplementing a possible fault, absence of colossal double > following chain is indicated: truth-unveiled-woman-castration-shame [Schreber]
FV.linkedContent: for Freud, dreams of nakedness don’t exhibit penis or absence of penis but absence of phallus, absence of attribute supplementing a possible fault, absence of colossal double > following chain is indicated: truth-unveiled-woman-castration-shame [Schreber]

FV.content: circular itinerary, Dupin & analyst find letter where they expect it: Queen wants letter-fetish brought back to her, exchanges one fetish for another w/out spending—because there’s equivalence here (assurance of return): circle of restricted economy, stricture of the ring
FV.linkedContent: circular itinerary, Dupin & analyst find letter where they expect it: Queen wants letter-fetish brought back to her, exchanges one fetish for another w/out spending—because there’s equivalence here (assurance of return): circle of restricted economy, stricture of the ring

FV.content: castration-truth is that which contracts itself (stricture of the ring): brings signifier, fetish, phallus, letter back into their oikos, familiar dwelling, proper place
FV.linkedContent: castration-truth is that which contracts itself (stricture of the ring): brings signifier, fetish, phallus, letter back into their oikos, familiar dwelling, proper place

FV.content: dissemination threatens law of signifier & castration as contract of truth, dissemination entame unity of signifier, i.e. the phallus
FV.linkedContent: dissemination threatens law of signifier & castration as contract of truth, dissemination entame unity of signifier, i.e. the phallus

FV.content: the 2 truths lean on, support each other (s’étaient): 1) adequation, circular return, garde et regarde, circuit of pact, control, guardianship (la garde) of the phallus as guardianship of the lack 2) veiling-unveiling as structure of lack, a proper place: les contours étant-la place du manque à être

FV.content: indestructibility of letter functions as pact binding 2 “singularities,” excludes all double simulacra: [in Lacan] subject is very divided, but phallus is not to be cut > at origin/end, there’s a word that doesn’t trick: the truth of the lure [p. 466n indivisibility in repetition compulsion]
FV.linkedContent: indestructibility of letter functions as pact binding 2 “singularities,” excludes all double simulacra: [in Lacan] subject is very divided, but phallus is not to be cut > at origin/end, there’s a word that doesn’t trick: the truth of the lure [p. 466n indivisibility in repetition compulsion]

FV.content: point de capiton safeguards indivisible, living, non-fragmentary integrity of phallus
FV.linkedContent: point de capiton safeguards indivisible, living, non-fragmentary integrity of phallus

FV.content: voice guards against the phallus becoming divisible, being reduced to part object, voice as ideal guardianship of partial/divisible object: mors disséminable (ce qui tombe)
FV.linkedContent: voice guards against the phallus becoming divisible, being reduced to part object, voice as ideal guardianship of partial/divisible object: mors disséminable (ce qui tombe)

FV.content: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”
FV.linkedContent: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”

FV.content: Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier

all phallogocentrism articulated based on (individual, perceptual, cultural, historical) situation where phallus is mother’s desire (to the extent she doesn’t have it) > though phallus isn’t the organ, it mostly symbolizes the penis > thus, phallogocentrism as androcentrism & woman as absolute Other
FV.linkedContent: all phallogocentrism articulated based on (individual, perceptual, cultural, historical) situation where phallus is mother’s desire (to the extent she doesn’t have it) > though phallus isn’t the organ, it mostly symbolizes the penis > thus, phallogocentrism as androcentrism & woman as absolute Other

FV.content: [re: psychoanalysis] institution built on male child’s experience > at stage of genital organization, there’s only maleness (antithesis isn’t femaleness but being castrated): phallogocentrism is no accident/error, its old, enormous root must be accounted for [described] > but, its description is a “participant” when it induces a practice, ethics, institution, a politics that insures truth of a tradition
FV.linkedContent: [re: psychoanalysis] institution built on male child’s experience > at stage of genital organization, there’s only maleness (antithesis isn’t femaleness but being castrated): phallogocentrism is no accident/error, its old, enormous root must be accounted for [described] > but, its description is a “participant” when it induces a practice, ethics, institution, a politics that insures truth of a tradition

FV.content: depth is height, flows out (débouche) toward the high, precisely the mouth (bouche) in which is “incarnated” the Nous, Logos, phallic signifier > reason is reason itself, aura raison, logic of kettle (a check [traite] drawn from reason): there is only one libido, it is masculine in nature
FV.linkedContent: depth is height, flows out (débouche) toward the high, precisely the mouth (bouche) in which is “incarnated” the Nous, Logos, phallic signifier > reason is reason itself, aura raison, logic of kettle (a check [traite] drawn from reason): there is only one libido, it is masculine in nature

FV.content: when letter isn’t allergic to partition, linguistic unit (le sème) “phallus” wanders, begins by disseminating, not even disseminating itself
FV.linkedContent: when letter isn’t allergic to partition, linguistic unit (le sème) “phallus” wanders, begins by disseminating, not even disseminating itself

CHOR.content: some can’t see beyond end of phallic forms in SP (bisexual complication of style, spur, umbrella): those people do not read the syntax and punctuation of a given sentence, arresting the text in a position, settling on a thesis, meaning or truth
